channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 16th September
item.description:
Cut back approx 4m of overgrown hedge either side of beginning of footpath as per photos - 28 days - Standard TM (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 16th September
item.description:
Cut back approx 50m of overgrown hedges/weeds on footpath - 28 days - Standard TM (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 16th September
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different please 9000x600x30mm with tarmac patch stats required number 1 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
